Keywords: Brute , Fantastic Four
Real Name: Bruce Banner
Special Powers
THE NEW FANTASTIC FOUR: Passenger: 1, but only to carry a character with the Fantastic Four keyword. // Once per turn when Joe Fixit is carried and placed adjacent to 2+ opposing characters, after resolutions he may make a close attack.
INCOMING!: Leap/Climb. // When Joe Fixit is given a move action, after resolutions he may make a close attack.
TWIN TOMMY GUNS: Range 6, 2 targets.

February 8, 2022
tidge
I rather like this update. The cost is improved, all aspects of the trait are useful, the special power do-overs are good. The 2021 redo of CCE helps at end-dial. I'm not at all concerned about the defense values with F4 keyword characters that can provide shared defense (e.g. Ghost Rider) or can provide Mastermind (Legacy Lockjaw).
